languages.text: "Мои странствия — Путь, что я сама избрала для себя. Вдали от стен Крудараха я видела и познала то, что не способен узреть иной {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдар{/g}, скрывавшийся всю жизнь за стенами мира-корабля. Почему ты отвергаешь мои слова о присутствии Сай'лантреш? Не потому ли, что солгал мне и моим собратьям, когда указывал нам верный путь?"

traits.locale_text: "Мои странствия — Путь, что я сама избрала для себя. Вдали от стен Крудараха я видела и познала то, что не способен узреть иной эльдар — первые признаки скверны. Почему ты отвергаешь мои слова о Сай'лантреш? Не потому ли, что солгал мне и моим собратьям, когда указывал нам верный путь?"

languages.text: "My wanderings are the Path I have chosen for myself. Far from the walls of Crudarach, I have seen and come to know things that no other {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} could hidden away in a craftworld their entire life. Why do you deny my words about Sai'lanthresh? Is it because you were lying to me and my kin when you showed us the true Path?"
languages.original_text: "Мои странствия — Путь, что я сама избрала для себя. Вдали от стен Крудараха я видела и познала то, что не способен узреть иной {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдар{/g}, скрывавшийся всю жизнь за стенами мира-корабля. Почему ты отвергаешь мои слова о присутствии Сай'лантреш? Не потому ли, что солгал мне и моим собратьям, когда указывал нам верный путь?"

Far from the walls of Crudarach, I have seen and come to know things that no other {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} could hidden away in a craftworld their entire life. Why do you deny my words about Sai'lanthresh? Is it because you were lying to me and my kin when you showed us the true Path?"

Far from the walls of Crudarach, I have seen and come to know things that no other {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} could hidden away in a craftworld their entire life. Why do you deny my words about Sai'lanthresh? Is it because you were lying to me and my kin when you showed us the true Path?"

Why do you deny my words about Sai'lanthresh? Is it because you were lying to me and my kin when you showed us the true Path?"

"My wanderings are the Path I have chosen for myself. Far from the walls of Crudarach, I have seen and come to know things that no other {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} could hidden away in a craftworld their entire life. Why do you deny my words about Sai'lanthresh? Is it because you were lying to me and my kin when you showed us the true Path?"

languages.text: “我的流浪者道途是我自己选择的道途。在远离克鲁达拉赫高墙的地方，我看到、了解到了那些躲在方舟世界的{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}们一辈子都无法看到的东西。你为什么要否认我关于赛·兰斯雷什的说法？是不是因为你在向我和我的亲族展示真正的道途时，对我们说了谎？”
languages.original_text: "My wanderings are the Path I have chosen for myself. Far from the walls of Crudarach, I have seen and come to know things that no other {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} could hidden away in a craftworld their entire life. Why do you deny my words about Sai'lanthresh? Is it because you were lying to me and my kin when you showed us the true Path?"

traits.locale_text: “我的流浪者道途是我自己选择的道途。在远离克鲁达拉赫高墙的地方，我看到、了解到了那些躲在方舟世界的{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}们一辈子都无法看到的东西。你为什么要否认我关于赛·兰斯雷什的说法？是不是因为你在向我和我的亲族展示真正的道途时，对我们说了谎？”

languages.text: 「放浪は我が自分で選んだ道だ。クルダラの壁を遠く離れ、{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}が皆、方舟に隠れて生涯を終えるわけではないと学んだ。なぜセランスレッシュの襲来を信じない？真の道を示したときに、我や我が同胞に嘘をついたからではないのか？」
languages.original_text: "My wanderings are the Path I have chosen for myself. Far from the walls of Crudarach, I have seen and come to know things that no other {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} could hidden away in a craftworld their entire life. Why do you deny my words about Sai'lanthresh? Is it because you were lying to me and my kin when you showed us the true Path?"

traits.locale_text: 「放浪は我が自分で選んだ道だ。クルダラの壁を遠く離れ、{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}が皆、方舟に隠れて生涯を終えるわけではないと学んだ。なぜセランスレッシュの襲来を信じない？真の道を示したときに、我や我が同胞に嘘をついたからではないのか？」

languages.text: "Meine Wanderungen sind der Pfad, den ich selbst für mich gewählt habe. Fernab der Mauern von Crudarach habe ich Dinge gesehen und erlebt, die kein anderer {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} sein ganzes Leben in einem Weltenschiff verbergen könnte. Warum verleugnet Ihr meine Worte über Sai'lanthresh? Ist es, weil Ihr mich und die Meinen belogen habt, als Ihr uns den wahren Pfad zeigtet?"
languages.original_text: "My wanderings are the Path I have chosen for myself. Far from the walls of Crudarach, I have seen and come to know things that no other {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} could hidden away in a craftworld their entire life. Why do you deny my words about Sai'lanthresh? Is it because you were lying to me and my kin when you showed us the true Path?"

traits.locale_text: "Meine Wanderungen sind der Pfad, den ich selbst für mich gewählt habe. Fernab der Mauern von Crudarach habe ich Dinge gesehen und erlebt, die kein anderer {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} sein ganzes Leben in einem Weltenschiff verbergen könnte. Warum verleugnet Ihr meine Worte über Sai'lanthresh? Ist es, weil Ihr mich und die Meinen belogen habt, als Ihr uns den wahren Pfad zeigtet?"

languages.text: « Mes voyages, mes errances sont la Voie que je me suis choisie. Après avoir quitté Crudarach, j'ai vu et découvert des choses qu'aucun autre {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} n'aurait jamais pu connaître en restant cloîtré dans un vaisseau-monde toute sa vie. Pourquoi niez-vous ce que j'ai dit à propos de Sai'lanthresh ? Est-ce parce que vous nous avez menti, à moi et à tout notre peuple, lorsque vous nous avez montré la véritable Voie ? »
languages.original_text: "My wanderings are the Path I have chosen for myself. Far from the walls of Crudarach, I have seen and come to know things that no other {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} could hidden away in a craftworld their entire life. Why do you deny my words about Sai'lanthresh? Is it because you were lying to me and my kin when you showed us the true Path?"

traits.locale_text: « Mes voyages, mes errances sont la Voie que je me suis choisie. Après avoir quitté Crudarach, j'ai vu et découvert des choses qu'aucun autre {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} n'aurait jamais pu connaître en restant cloîtré dans un vaisseau-monde toute sa vie. Pourquoi niez-vous ce que j'ai dit à propos de Sai'lanthresh ? Est-ce parce que vous nous avez menti, à moi et à tout notre peuple, lorsque vous nous avez montré la véritable Voie ? »

languages.text: «Mi deambular es la Senda que he elegido. Lejos de los muros de Crudarach, he visto y aprendido más de lo que ningún {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} encerrado en su mundo astronave puede imaginar. ¿Por qué rechazas mis palabras sobre Sai'lanthresh? ¿Es porque la auténtica Senda que nos enseñaste a mí y a los nuestros no es más que un engaño?».
languages.original_text: "My wanderings are the Path I have chosen for myself. Far from the walls of Crudarach, I have seen and come to know things that no other {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} could hidden away in a craftworld their entire life. Why do you deny my words about Sai'lanthresh? Is it because you were lying to me and my kin when you showed us the true Path?"

traits.locale_text: «Mi deambular es la Senda que he elegido. Lejos de los muros de Crudarach, he visto y aprendido más de lo que ningún {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} encerrado en su mundo astronave puede imaginar. ¿Por qué rechazas mis palabras sobre Sai'lanthresh? ¿Es porque la auténtica Senda que nos enseñaste a mí y a los nuestros no es más que un engaño?».

languages.text: "Seyahatlerim, kendime çizdiğim Yoldur. Crudarach'ın duvarlarından uzakta, bir ömür tek bir gemidünyaya tıkılmış hiçbir {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari'nin{/g} bilemeyeceği şeyler gördüm, öğrendim. Sai'lanthresh hakkında dediklerimi neden inkâr ediyorsun? Yoksa bize doğru Yolu gösterirken bana ve soydaşlarıma yalan söylediğin için mi?"
languages.original_text: "My wanderings are the Path I have chosen for myself. Far from the walls of Crudarach, I have seen and come to know things that no other {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} could hidden away in a craftworld their entire life. Why do you deny my words about Sai'lanthresh? Is it because you were lying to me and my kin when you showed us the true Path?"

traits.locale_text: "Seyahatlerim, kendime çizdiğim Yoldur. Crudarach'ın duvarlarından uzakta, bir ömür tek bir gemidünyaya tıkılmış hiçbir {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'nin bilemeyeceği şeyler gördüm, öğrendim. Sai'lanthresh hakkında dediklerimi neden inkâr ediyorsun? Yoksa bize doğru Yolu gösterirken bana ve soydaşlarıma yalan söylediğin için mi?"
